bibl.title: New Perspectives on the Gemellus Archive. Sabinus and His Correspondence.
bibl.note: The archive of the Roman veteran Lucius Bellienus Gemellus comprises approximately 100 papyri.

bibl.title: Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & Giuseppina Azzarello, New Perspectives on the Gemellus Archive. Sabinus and His Correspondence.

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 19-28, 1 fig., 1 pl.
The archive of the Roman veteran Lucius Bellienus Gemellus comprises approximately 100 papyri.
